description: Lonely, small-town boy Luke Reed dreams of a life away from his small town. For fun, he dresses his mannequin, pretending that he's the boyfriend he yearns for. After slipping off for a little nap with his doll, he awakens to find his mannequin has come to life. It's Evan Landers, his Perfect Boyfriend! The two kiss and undress, before taking turns sucking each other. Evan bends Luke over to rim him, then slides his cock in to Luke's ready hole. Evan fucks Luke doggy, then Luke climbs on top to ride him. Next, they flip, and it's Luke's turn to top Evan in missionary. They finish, wrapped in each other's arms, Luke happy to finally find the man of his dreams.
title: The Perfect Boyfriend
